src:
Agonija Fenera, prva pobeda Valensije
01 Nov 2019, 21:14 by Darko
Valensija – Asvel 81:72 (16:18, 19:18, 21:16, 25:20)
Košarkaši Valensije su ostvarili prvu pobedu u Evroligi ove sezone. Španski tim je pred svojim navijačima u 6. kolu pobedio Asvel rezultatom 81:72.
Bojan Dubljević je sa 13 poena i osam skokova predvodio Valensiju, Vives je dodao 10 poena, a Vanja Marinković je za 15 minuta imao učinak od šest poena. U francuskom timu najefikasniji su bili Žal-Šarl Livio sa 20 i Antoan Dio sa 17 poena.
Fenerbahče – Žalgiris 76:79 (17:17, 23:16, 19:19, 17:27)
Agonija Željka Obradovića i Fenerbahčea nastavljena je i u 6. kolu Evrolige. Turski tim je doživeo peti poraz, ovoga puta u Istanbulu od Žalgirisa u utakmici u kojoj je imao pobedu u džepu.
Fener je nekoliko puta pravio pristojnu razliku, ali bi gosti iz Litvanije pronalazili način da uhvate priključak. Ekipa Željka Obradovića je minut i po pre kraja imala sedam poena prednosti i napad, ali ni to nije bilo dovoljno za drugi trijumf u Evroligi.
Grigonis je trojkom 50 sekundi pre kraja pokrenuo preokret. Ređali su se promašaji i greške igrača Fenera, da bi Grigonis devet sekundi pre kraja pogodio za 76:77. Posle tajm-auta Obradovića, Jan Veseli je promašio šut za pobedu, a junak trijumfa Žalgirisa Marijus Grigonis sa linije slobodnih bacanja potpisao trijumf svog tima.
Nando De Kolo je sa 29 poena bio najefikasniji u poraženom timu, za koji je Nikola Kalinić igrao 15 minuta i postigao jedan poen. Grigonis sa 19 i Ledej sa 16 poena bili su najbolji u Žalgirisu, koji je stigao do treće pobede u elitnom takmičenju.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Fener's Agony, Valencia's first win
01 Nov 2019, 20:14 by Darko
Valencia - Asvel 81:72 (16:18, 19:18, 21:16, 25:20)
The Valencia basketball players achieved their first Euroleague victory of the season. The Spanish team beat Asvel in the sixth round with an 81:72 result.
Bojan Dubljevic led Valencia with 13 points and eight rebounds, Vives added 10 points, and Vanja Marinkovic had six points in 15 minutes. On the French team, the most efficient were Jal-Charles Livio with 20 points and Antoine Dio with 17 points.
Fenerbahce SK - Zalgiris 76:79 (17:17, 23:16, 19:19, 17:27)
The agony of Zeljko Obradovic and Fenerbahce continued in the 6th round of the Euroleague. The Turkish team suffered a fifth defeat, this time in Istanbul from Zalgiris in a match in which he had a pocket win.
Fener made a decent difference several times, but guests from Lithuania would find a way to catch the port. Željko Obradović's team had a seven-point advantage and attack a minute and a half before the end, but that wasn't enough for a second Euroleague triumph.
Grigonis launched a turnaround 50 seconds before the end. The Fener players' mistakes and errors were reduced, with Grigonis hitting 76:77 nine seconds before the end. After Obradovic's time-out, Jan Veselli missed the shot to win, and Zalgiris' triumph hero Marius Grigonis from the free-throw line signed his team's triumph.
With 29 points, Nando De Colo was the most efficient on the losing team, with Nikola Kalinic playing for 15 minutes and scoring one point. Grigonis with 19 and Leday with 16 points were the best in Zalgiris, which reached the third victory in elite competition.
